title: IComponent2.IRemoveMaterialProperty2
description: Removes material property values from the component.
signature:
System.Boolean IRemoveMaterialProperty2( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Int32
Config_count
,
   ref System.String
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_count
parameters.description: Number of configurations for this component

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names for this component

returns: True if the material property values are removed, false if not
remarks: This method is intended to be used on components whose material property value has changed; for example, color.
